title: Neuroanatomy Fundamentals: e-Learning-Based Learning Module for Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical terminology and human anatomy understanding
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education linked to project-based assessment in a BYOD environment, aimed at alleviating neurophobia (fear of neuroanatomy) among current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the main structures and functions of the central nervous system with over 80% accuracy
Learners can apply neural transmission pathways to real-world cases through 3D animations and interactive quizzes
Learners can write a neurological symptom analysis report for spinal cord injury patients through team projects
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
